Purchase Line School District will be offering a preschool (Pre-K) program for the 2020-21 school year. Children who are (3) three or four (4) years of age prior to September 1, 2020, are eligible to apply for admittance and all students entered into the program will receive a school readiness screening. Preference will be given to 4 year olds.

Our program is fully funded by the Pennsylvania Pre-K Counts Grant as a full-day, income and risk factor based program. Transportation will be provided.

Should you wish to have your child considered for the preschool, please submit the registration by May 1, 2020. Forms can be found on our website at www.plsd.k12.pa.us > click on Public Notices > Pre K Enrollment. Completed applications can be returned via email districtoffice@plsd.k12.pa.us, mailed to Purchase Line School District, Attn: Pre-K Registration, 16559 Route 286 Hwy E, Commodore, PA 15729 or dropped off at the PLSD District Office.

If you have any questions please contact the Purchase Line Elementary School at 724-254-4312 ext. 5804.

We are asking for community help to make our graduation parade extra special for our seniors. On the evening of June 5th our graduating seniors will be lining up at KMI (the former North Elementary in Mahaffey) at 7:45 PM. They will be traveling along Route 286 to the high school for their graduation ceremony. We know that our seniors would love to see signs and balloons along the parade route and members of our community cheering them on their way. People that don't live along the parade route may watch the parade by parking their cars in a safe spot along the way to see the seniors drive by. If there is anything we have learned throughout the last few months, it is that we have an amazing and supportive community that comes together for one another. We can't wait to see all of you on June 5th!

#PleaseShare #Classof2020 #PLPride
